ACH_CHALLENGE_ACCEPTED.name: Challenge accepted
ACH_CHALLENGE_ACCEPTED.description: Beat "Restoring the peace" on "Challenging" difficulty preset.

ACH_DEFEAT_THE_BARON.name: Defeat Hildebolt
ACH_DEFEAT_THE_BARON.description: Defeat the baron in the "Restoring the peace" scenario.

ACH_MERCENARY_CAPTAIN.name: Mercenary Captain
ACH_MERCENARY_CAPTAIN.description: Beat "Restoring the peace" with Mercenary units only.

ACH_SURVIVE_YEAR.name: Survive the first year
ACH_SURVIVE_YEAR.description: Face the winter and have your settlers not abandon you.

ACH_THE_MERCHANT.name: The merchant
ACH_THE_MERCHANT.description: Get to a "small town" settlement level without hunting or gathering berries.

ACH_VIGILANTES.name: The vigilantes
ACH_VIGILANTES.description: Destroy a squad of brigands with a squad of militia in a non battle game mode.

Pal_Achievement_24.name: All for One
Pal_Achievement_24.description: Maximized the rank of a Pal

Pal_Achievement_50.name: Arena Champion
Pal_Achievement_50.description: Reached Master Rank in the Arena

Pal_Achievement_51.name: Best Friends Forever
Pal_Achievement_51.description: Reached Trust level 10 with a Pal

Pal_Achievement_28.name: Champion of the Palpagos Islands
Pal_Achievement_28.description: Defeated 6 tower bosses in hard mode

Pal_Achievement_14.name: Incarnation of the Eternal Flame
Pal_Achievement_14.description: Summoned and defeated a Blazamut Ryu

Pal_Achievement_49.name: Silver Champ
Pal_Achievement_49.description: Reached Silver Rank in the Arena

AGlitchInTheSystem.name: A Glitch in the System
AGlitchInTheSystem.description: See the same collapse happen twice.

DownTheRabbitHole.name: Down the Rabbit Hole
DownTheRabbitHole.description: Have a tea party with friends.

InstantHangover.name: Instant Hangover
InstantHangover.description: Use a bottle to knock out an enemy.

LockedAndLoaded.name: Locked and Loaded
LockedAndLoaded.description: Go out on a mission to help your wife.

LostAndFound.name: Lost and Found
LostAndFound.description: Retrieve something that was taken from you.

NoSpace.name: No Space for a Treehouse
NoSpace.description: In the home station, find the children's secret hideout.

NotJustDejaVu.name: Not Just Dj Vu
NotJustDejaVu.description: Bring an object from a hypnotic dream back to the real world.

NowIHaveAMachineGun.name: Now I Have a Machine Gun Ho-Ho-Ho
NowIHaveAMachineGun.description: After getting imprisoned, kill all slavers on the platform before retrieving your gear.

ReturnToSender.name: Return to Sender
ReturnToSender.description: Retrieve a Helsing bolt from 6 killed enemies.

SoftTissue.name: Soft Tissue
SoftTissue.description: Hit Nosalises in their weakspots 30 times.

Spartan.name: Spartan
Spartan.description: Complete the game on hardcore difficulty.

SpringCleaning.name: Spring Cleaning
SpringCleaning.description: Burn all blocking cobwebs in the labyrinth on your first visit.

TheWay.name: The Way to a Womans Heart

ThreadingANeedle.name: Threading a Needle
ThreadingANeedle.description: Kill an elite slaver with a single headshot through their visor.

TiliTiliBom.name: Tili Tili Bom
TiliTiliBom.description: Follow the singing pipes all the way to the metro tunnel.

UnresolvedBusiness.name: Unresolved Business
UnresolvedBusiness.description: Free the people locked inside an old train cart.

HippocraticOath.name: Upholding the Hippocratic Oath
HippocraticOath.description: In a single playthrough, complete all stealth sections without killing any human enemies or getting seen.

WelterweightChampion.name: Welterweight Champion
WelterweightChampion.description: Take out 5 enemies using a melee knockdown.

Campaign won difficulty 1.name: And they lived happily ever after
Campaign won difficulty 1.description: Complete the campaign in story mode.

Build all buildings.name: Architect
Build all buildings.description: Build all buildings on a single map.

Campaign won difficulty 2.name: Atra would be proud of you, Soldier!
Campaign won difficulty 2.description: Complete the campaign in beginner mode.

Baby boom.name: Baby Boom
Baby boom.description: Reach a newborn rate of 12 per minute.

Campaign won difficulty 3.name: Braver than a Fearnaught!
Campaign won difficulty 3.description: Complete the campaign in average mode.

Co-op bully.name: Bully
Co-op bully.description: Destroy a building shortly after another player placed it.

Wood Stored.name: Busy Beaver
Wood Stored.description: Store 2000 tree trunks in storages at the same time in one game.

Camps destroyed.name: Conqueror
Camps destroyed.description: Defeat all enemy camps on a single map.

All trades completed.name: Dealmaker
All trades completed.description: Complete all available trades from a single faction.

Claim the island.name: Everything the light touches
Claim the island.description: Expand your territory to include the whole island.

Light setting cycle.name: Good morning, and in case I don't see ya, good afternoon, good evening, and good night!
Light setting cycle.description: Change your light setting manually once.

Campaign won difficulty 4.name: Hero of Pagonia
Campaign won difficulty 4.description: Complete the campaign in hard mode.

Light Spire built.name: I spy with my little eye

Map won in time.name: In a hurry?
Map won in time.description: Win the map "Eldritch Lights" in under XXX hours.

Farming.name: It ain't much, but it's honest work...
Farming.description: Harvest a resource from a farm field.

Wealth reached.name: Mom, I am a rich man

Cabbage destroyer.name: My Cabbages!!!
Cabbage destroyer.description: Demolish a small storage full of cabbages.

hidden_one.name: Pagonians assemble
hidden_one.description: Merge with 4 Pagonian villages on a single map.

Comfort rabbit.name: Rabbit of Great Comfort
Comfort rabbit.description: Build the Rabbit of Great Comfort Statue once.

Long road.name: Road Rage
Long road.description: Build a total of 300 km of road.

hidden_two.name: Scavenger
hidden_two.description: Harvest all surface and underground mining resources on a map.

All units employed.name: Specialized in everything
All units employed.description: Have at least one of every unit type in one game.

Map won in co-op.name: Teamwork makes the dream work
Map won in co-op.description: Win a map while playing co-op.

Random map won.name: Yippieh!
Random map won.description: Win a map that was generated using the map generator (not with the Pagonia Editor).

Outlaws_Ach_53.name: A moon in your hand
Outlaws_Ach_53.description: Retrieve the map to Okala V

Outlaws_Ach_21.description: Win your first fixed fathier race

info.name: CRISIS CORE FINAL FANTASY VII REUNION

Trophy_Title_28.name: Banora Treasures
Trophy_Title_28.description: Collected all items and arrived at Angeal's house before the Banora airstrike.

Trophy_Title_41.name: Bingo!
Trophy_Title_41.description: Guessed the exact number in the number-guessing game.

Trophy_Title_38.name: Cage Opener
Trophy_Title_38.description: Opened the path to the Cage of Binding.

Trophy_Title_33.name: Cell Raider
Trophy_Title_33.description: Checked all cells on the 67th floor of the Shinra Building.

Trophy_Title_12.name: Come and Get It
Trophy_Title_12.description: Won a battle for the first time.

Trophy_Title_29.name: Everyone's Hero
Trophy_Title_29.description: Saved everyone calling for help during the assault on the Shinra Building in Chapter 3.

Trophy_Title_35.name: Fan Club Savior
Trophy_Title_35.description: Helped every fan club continue their activities.

Trophy_Title_30.name: First-Rate SOLDIER
Trophy_Title_30.description: Defeated all virtual data in the Training Room.

Trophy_Title_42.name: Godlike
Trophy_Title_42.description: Rated to have "godlike speed" in collecting materia.

Trophy_Title_48.name: Good Match For Aerith
Trophy_Title_48.description: Told by Bruno that you and Aerith "make a good couple."

Trophy_Title_14.name: Got Materia Fusion Down
Trophy_Title_14.description: Performed materia fusion for the first time.

Trophy_Title_25.name: Hero of the Wutai War?
Trophy_Title_25.description: Received highest evaluation from Lazard for Assault on Fort Tamblin.

Trophy_Title_45.name: Immovable Object
Trophy_Title_45.description: Defeated all enemies in Defense of the Junon Perimeter.

Trophy_Title_40.name: Master Blender
Trophy_Title_40.description: Blended a perfume with the perfect amount of oil.

Trophy_Title_44.name: Master Infiltrator
Trophy_Title_44.description: Infiltrated the mako excavation facility without being discovered once.

Trophy_Title_27.name: Master Mako Stone Miner
Trophy_Title_27.description: Prevented the Materia Room from being shut down.

Trophy_Title_32.name: Of Significant Worth
Trophy_Title_32.description: Judged by Hojo to be a "SOLDIER member of significant worth" in the Fusion Chamber.

Trophy_Title_31.name: Precise Restoration
Trophy_Title_31.description: Achieved 100% recovery with the Mako Recovery Unit.

Trophy_Title_13.name: Prove Your Honor to Me
Trophy_Title_13.description: Performed a limit break for the first time.

Trophy_Title_37.name: Seven Wonders Expert
Trophy_Title_37.description: Learned about all of Nibelheim's Seven Wonders.

Trophy_Title_43.name: Shinra's Squats Champion
Trophy_Title_43.description: Achieved victory against the SOLDIER 2nd Class in the physical fitness test.

Trophy_Title_50.name: SOLDIER of Legend
Trophy_Title_50.description: Cleared the game in Hard Mode.

Trophy_Title_47.name: Waterfall Chaser
Trophy_Title_47.description: Collected ten chests coming down the waterfall in the hills of Gongaga.

Trophy_Title_34.name: Wutai's Nemesis
Trophy_Title_34.description: Caught all the Wutai spies that had infiltrated Midgar.

Trophy_Title_46.name: Zack the Sniper
Trophy_Title_46.description: Did not allow a single gun bull head to escape while sniping.

A_REAL_HERO.name: A real hero

EUREKA.name: Eureka!

ACHIEVEMENT_NAME_STATS_FORGOTRELOAD.description: Try to fire your weapon without first reloading it.

ACHIEVEMENT_NAME_SPECIAL_HYPNO_KILL.description: Have a hypnotized enemy kill another enemy.

ACHIEVEMENT_NAME_IRONIC_BOMBER.description: Kill an enemy bomber using a grenade.

ACHIEVEMENT_NAME_IRONIC_SNIPER.description: Kill an enemy sniper from far away.

ACHIEVEMENT_NAME_IRONIC_MAGE.name: Ironically Spelled
ACHIEVEMENT_NAME_IRONIC_MAGE.description: Kill an enemy priest using magic.

ACHIEVEMENT_NAME_ACTION_GHOST_PRAYER.name: My Condolences
ACHIEVEMENT_NAME_ACTION_GHOST_PRAYER.description: After death, find your ghost and pray to it.

ACHIEVEMENT_NAME_STATS_COINS.name: Penny Pincher
ACHIEVEMENT_NAME_STATS_COINS.description: Hold onto 1,000 coins at once during a run.

ACHIEVEMENT_NAME_RUN_ALL_HEADSHOTS.name: Perfect Shot
ACHIEVEMENT_NAME_RUN_ALL_HEADSHOTS.description: Every single shot during a fully completed run is a headshot.

ACHIEVEMENT_NAME_PROGRESS_DEATH.name: Phoenix Downed
ACHIEVEMENT_NAME_PROGRESS_DEATH.description: Die and be revived for the first time.

ACHIEVEMENT_NAME_ACTION_ENEMY_WEAPON_KIL.name: Resourceful Kill
ACHIEVEMENT_NAME_ACTION_ENEMY_WEAPON_KIL.description: Use an enemy's dropped weapon to kill another enemy.

ACHIEVEMENT_NAME_PROGRESS_RESCUE.description: Rescue an ally Light Brigade soldier out on a run.

ACHIEVEMENT_NAME_RUN_NO_MISS.name: Steady Hands
ACHIEVEMENT_NAME_RUN_NO_MISS.description: Never miss a shot during a fully completed run.

ACHIEVEMENT_NAME_COMPLETE_A_RUN.name: The First Journey
ACHIEVEMENT_NAME_COMPLETE_A_RUN.description: Finish your first run, start to finish.

burn-contacts.name: Bridge Burner
burn-contacts.description: Burn 3 contacts in a single run

kill-with-thumper.name: Flatlined
kill-with-thumper.description: Demolish 20 bots with the Crack Zoo Thumper

jack-arm-rip.name: Jackn't

headshot-biting-alpha.name: Not Today
headshot-biting-alpha.description: Headshot an Alpha Dog while it's biting you

hit-airborne-bot-with-another.name: Shot Down
hit-airborne-bot-with-another.description: Hit an airborne bot with a grabbed bot

win-fights-without-damage.name: Teflon
win-fights-without-damage.description: Avoid damage for 2 fights in the same run

help-bot-fly.name: To the moon
help-bot-fly.description: Help a bot travel 100 meters upwards

ACH_MOSS2_ENEMY_INTERCEPT.description: Use a controlled Forged enemy to block an attack.

ACH_MOSS2_PLOT_HAMMER.description: Acquire Cariel's Hammer in the Foundry.

ACH_MOSS2_BOND_3.name: Babe With the Power
ACH_MOSS2_BOND_3.description: Charge Quill's weapon while in alternate gravity.

ACH_MOSS2_ENEMY_TICKER.description: Destroy a Ticker with a controlled Ticker.

ACH_MOSS2_RELICDUST.description: Collect all of the Relic Dust.
